- 해당파을 오른쪽 클릭 `Open in integrated terminal`
- `npm i typescript -g`
- `tsc index.ts`
- `tsconfig.json`
  - [tsconfig.json 옵션](https://www.typescriptlang.org/tsconfig)

```
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "allowJs": true,
    "checkJs": true,
    "noImplicitAny": true // 기본적인 타입이라도 넣어야 함
  }
}
```

- [타입스크립트 플레이그라운드](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play?#-Fg0HUiS58D0Ii8AoZTJZggFSRxAvADlQAHJhAA5SASAVBFQAeW+ZF2gldWkgx1QjgUrmkeFATgtOlGWH0KAQiBhwiudokkuiIgMHBx3RYbC43CCJSAA)
